item.description:
** Note Date Change due to scheduling conflict...Now August 18th**

We're back to Lisa & Dave's to use some of the skills learned at Elaine & Francis' home...we will assemble the hoop house for winter harvesting of greens and create a small frog pond with [possibly] a stream bed leading to it which will eventually bring in overflow from the rain barrel. We may have some blueberry to plant near the frog pond...

This is year 2 of our permaculture transformation so please join us for this work in progress!

Assemble at 9am (coffee/tea/morning snacks provided)...a few hours of work...followed by the requisite potluck meal that this group has become known for:)

Rain date on Sunday!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: August Work Party
